General.Name: MCT Bhd
General.Description: Avaland Berhad, an investment holding company, operates as a property development company in Malaysia. It develops residential and commercial properties. The company is involved in the civil engineering and electrical works; trading of construction materials; rental of plant and machinery; provision of sales and marketing services for property development; and property investment and management business activities. In addition, it offers civil, mechanical engineering, management, and utilities services. The company was formerly known as MCT Berhad and changed its name to Avaland Berhad in June 2023. Avaland Berhad was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Subang Jaya, Malaysia. Avaland Berhad is a subsidiary of Regent Wise Investments Limited.
